children.text: Please go to the next Tab to set up the GitHub API -->
Enter name of the Github repository
Enter GitHub username of the owner of the repository mentioned above
Enter your GitHub personal access token

Creating your GitHub Personal Access Token: docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token

GitHub Releases API docs: docs.github.com/en/rest/releases/releases

GitHub API Basic Authentication docs: docs.github.com/en/rest/overview/other-authentication-methods#basic-authentication
Please set up the APIs for the app to function well
